description: Create a new service type unit of measure cohort.
permissions: User must be authorized to update the associated customer (per the service type unit of measure cohort policy).
side_effects: Creates a service type unit of measure cohort.
validation_notes: --customer, --trigger, and --service-type-unit-of-measure-ids are required. Trigger must be unique per customer. Service type unit of measure IDs must be present, unique, refer to existing service type unit of measures, and cannot include the trigger. Name must be unique per customer when provided.

flags.name: --trigger
flags.description: Trigger service type unit of measure ID (required)

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure-ids
flags.description: Service type unit of measure IDs (comma-separated or repeated) (required)
